questionTitle: It's a good idea to see your doctor regularly for ________.
If we had known your new address, we ________ to see you.
Look, Mother! Jack has ________ you some flowers.
He played an active ________ in politics until he was well over 80.
Clock-making is very ________ work which takes years to learn.
She ________ him of wanting to marry her for her money.
It was raining very ________ so I took my umbrella.
The judge ________ him twenty pounds for parking his car illegally.
Do you know what the time the train ________ to Birmingham?
Mary never turned ________ at the cinema, although I waited over an hour.
The accused man ________ to give the police any more information.
Can you give me ________ information about taking my car abroad?
He was the only person to ________ the crash. Everyone else was killed.
He has always been fond ________ games.
I heard him ________ to Jim about his holiday plans.
All these sweaters are extremely ________ by the local residents of a small Scottish island.
Too many undergraduates think it is easy to ________ a job once they leave university. Unfortunately, jobs for graduates are getting scare. Finding a suitable one is another problem.
Bob's always sucking up to the boss. I guess he's ________ for promotion.
The poetry of Mallarme, like the poetry od most of the symbolists, is not clear and easily accessible but rather vague and ________.
as rich as ________ = extremely rich.
